Artikel Project Utas

Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari

BS Informatics at Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta, Indonesia

I'm a BS Informatics student at Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta, Indonesia. My research interest mainly in Data Engineering, I also love exploring Software Engineering, Data Discovery, Information Retrieval research topics.

During my studies, I have worked with Prof. Kusrini in geospatial data processing for the SILVANUS Project. Before that, I worked as a data engineer for a big data solution company in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, where I handled data flows from upstream to downstream.

Publications

  • GIS data support technique for forest fire management and decision support system: A Sebangau National Park, Kalimantan case
    Kumara Ari Yuana, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Arif Dwi Laksito, Zauvik Rizaldi Maruf, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 6th International Conference on Information and Communications Technology (ICOIACT), 2023
  • Machine Learning and Social Media Harvesting for Wildfire Prevention
    Arif Dwi Laksito, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 13th International Conference on Pattern Recognition Systems (ICPRS), 2023
  • Monte Carlo Method For Map Area Calculation In Wildland Fire Map Management
    Kumara Ari Yuana, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Arif Dwi Laksito, Zauvik Rizaldi Maruf, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 6th International Conference on Information Technology, Information Systems and Electrical Engineering (ICITISEE), 2022
  • The Hybrid Recommender System of the Indonesian Online Market Products using IMDb weight rating and TF-IDF
    Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, Arif Dwi Laksito
    Journal of Rekayasa Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi (RESTI), 2021
